alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued April 26 at 8:27AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...RAINY AND VERMILLION BASIN UPDATE... Flooding along the Rainy, Big Fork, Littlefork, and Vermillion Rivers will be possible in response to snowmelt and recent heavy rains upstream. Levels on tributaries across Koochiching county are near 2014 levels. While the Littlefork and Big Fork rivers are cresting, slow declines from these levels are expected. For the Rainy River downstream of International Falls near Manitou Rapids, levels are currently near those seen in 2001. Additional rises are possible on the mainstem Rainy, with levels to be impacted by dam releases. For the Vermillion River near Crane Lake, levels are currently near those seen in 2001 with continued slow rises possible.
